title: Summer's Favorite Dessert Cookbook:  30 Best Homemade Ice Cream Recipes of All Time
description: Craving a Cool Summer Treat? This book has got you covered! Summer's Favorite Dessert Cookbook is all about the best summertime dessert of all time—ice cream! The taste of homemade ice cream simply cannot be beat. With the simple, straightforward and delicious recipes in this book, you can be enjoying a bowl of creamy goodness in no time. Enjoy recipes like:•	Peach Ice Cream•	Black Cherry Yogurt•	Tiramisu Gelato•	Lavender Lemon Sorbet•	Sweet Cream SherbetSummer’s Favorite Dessert Cookbook is about to become your favorite guide this summer. Choose from 30 tried and true recipes to create the perfect dessert for your family and friends tonight.
author: Karen Pettine
